_comment: COMPLETE CONFIGURATION GUIDE - Copy values to simu.json to use them
_note: This file is for reference only. Edit simu.json for actual simulation parameters.

guideline.description: Boundary condition guideline for domain sizing and BCs

details.AIJ: 5H up / 15H down / 5H side / 6H top (classic wind tunnel guidelines) - uses symmetry BCs
details.1-Side: Keep existing zeroGradient style with symmetric generous padding
details.AllSides: Sides can switch inflow/outflow; uses inletOutlet BCs on lateral boundaries

guideline.recommendation: Use 'AIJ' for standard wind engineering studies

solo.description: Run simulation in solo mode (exclude zone 1 from STL filtering)
solo.details: When true, excludes STL files containing 'Zona_1' from the simulation

details.transiente: Time-dependent simulation with runTime write control
details.permanente: Steady-state simulation with timeStep write control

deltat.constraint: Should satisfy Courant number < 1 for stability

cores.description: Number of CPU cores for parallel processing
cores.recommendation: Set based on available hardware (typically 4-32 cores)

cells.description: Maximum number of cells in the mesh
cells.recommendation: Start with 30-100 for testing, increase to 500-5000 for production

refinementBox.description: Refinement level for the background Cartesian mesh
refinementBox.details: Controls the base mesh resolution before snappyHexMesh refinement

surfaceLayers.description: Number of boundary layers near building surfaces
surfaceLayers.details: More layers improve boundary layer resolution but increase cell count

refinementSurface1.description: First level of surface refinement (coarse features)

refinementSurface2.description: Second level of surface refinement (fine features)

addLayers.description: Add prism layers near building surfaces
addLayers.details: Essential for accurate wall modeling and boundary layer resolution

paddingDomain.description: Domain padding factor relative to tallest building height
paddingDomain.details: Domain extends this many building heights beyond the building footprint

targetMinCellSize.description: Minimum cell size in the refined regions

transitionDistances.description: Distance levels for gradual mesh refinement transitions
transitionDistances.details: Mesh refines at these distances from buildings (closer = finer mesh)

nCellsBetweenLevels.description: Number of buffer cells between different refinement levels
nCellsBetweenLevels.details: More cells = smoother transitions but larger cell count

velo.description: Wind velocity vector at reference height
velo.details: Ux = streamwise, Uy = spanwise, Uz = vertical components

details.true: Apply logarithmic/power-law velocity profile based on height

useProfiles.recommendation: Use true for realistic wind simulations

site_name.description: Terrain type for atmospheric boundary layer parameters

details.log: Umag(z) = (u*/kappa) * ln((z-d)/z0) - physically based, more accurate

slope.details: Higher values = more shear, steeper velocity gradient

zmax.recommendation: Set to domain height or gradient height

T.description: Ambient air temperature in the far field

rejectedHeat.description: Heat rejection rate from air conditioning systems
rejectedHeat.details: Applied as a heat flux boundary condition on building surfaces

projectionDistance.description: Distance from building walls for sensor/probe placement
projectionDistance.details: Used for post-processing and result extraction near surfaces

Lchar.description: Characteristic length scale for turbulence modeling
Lchar.details: Used in turbulence model length scales, typically small near walls
